Life Insurance New Premium Surges 8% in Third Quarter, LIMRA Finds by Carrie Haubensak | Nov 21, 2024 | Insurance Industry, Life InsuranceTotal new annualized premium jumped 8% to $3.9 billion in the third quarter 2024, according to preliminary results from LIMRA’s retail individual life insurance sales survey. The number of policies sold rose 3% year over year in the third quarter. Year to date, new...

CNO Financial Group Reports Medicare Supplement Sales in 3rd Quarter 2024 by Carrie Haubensak | Nov 21, 2024 | Insurance Industry, Medicare, Medicare SupplementCNO Financial Group (parent company of Bankers Life & Casualty, Washington National, and Colonial Penn) reported 3rd quarter 2024 Medicare Supplement sales of $10.0 million, 3% lower than sales in 2nd quarter 2024 and 15% higher than sales in 3rd quarter 2023. ...
